name: Color Switch (itch) (3Mar)
description:
a small 2d platformer, about 2 worlds cave, and grassland and you need to switch between them to win 

Made in 2 days for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together" 

Credits:

  • some sounds are from the Wowie pack
  • Music Producer: @vilgotiano
  • and the rest is made by me :)
